primary_mission: Finalize FreeRideInvestor V2 deployment and harden WP deploy tooling
progress_summary: Uploaded missing js/theme.js via SFTP; verified 200 response (10,330 bytes)
Purged LiteSpeed/WP cache with wordpress_manager; ready for permalinks save
Added --remote-path flag to wordpress_manager deploy_file for precise single-file uploads
Prepared TSLA daily plan poster helper (WP App Password flow) for content automation
infrastructure_excellence_status: FreeRideInvestor V2 assets live; cache flush pending permalinks save

blocking_items: wp-admin login needed to Save Changes on Settings -> Permalinks to finalize cache
next_session_priorities: Perform permalinks Save in wp-admin and hard refresh homepage
Use wordpress_manager --remote-path for any follow-up single-file fixes
Optionally schedule tsla_daily_plan_poster.py with WP app password

knowledge_transfers: Explicit remote paths prevent SFTP uploads from landing in wrong dirs on Hostinger
After theme replacement, always verify CSS/JS endpoints and force permalinks save
tsla_daily_plan_poster.py posts daily plan via WP REST + application password
tools_created: tools/tsla_daily_plan_poster.py -- daily TSLA plan poster using WP application password
lessons_learned: Single-file deploys need remote-path targeting; defaults can miss nested theme paths
Cache flush via CLI helps but permalinks Save is the final step for WP rewrites
next_actions: Captain/Owner: log into wp-admin and Save permalinks
Recheck homepage for clean text/nav; report if any 404s remain
blockers: Waiting on wp-admin access to Save permalinks
